bpp/descriptor.name: DhiHyperlocal
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: We strive to provide valuable solutions for our customers, no matter their individual needs
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Our customers are our top priority - We strive to provide valuable solutions for our customers, no matter their individual needs. Our goal is to gain an in-depth understanding of all their challenges and issues, so we can empower them with the answers that really make a difference.

descriptor.name: ret hyderbad
descriptor.short_desc: an italian pizza refers to the one that’s cooked in a very hot oven and features a thin crust and simple flavors. it is the most common type of pizza
descriptor.long_desc: lt;pgt;anamp;nbsp;lt;stronggt;italian pizzalt;/stronggt;amp;nbsp;refers to the one thatamp;rsquo;s cooked in a very hot oven and features a thin crust and simple flavors. it is the most common type of pizza served in most places.lt;/pgt;lt;pgt;although the primary flavors of an italian pizza come from its signature pizza sauce and thin crust, toppings like onion, capsicum, chicken, etc., can also be added.lt;/pgt;lt;pgt;to ensure you get the perfect italian pizza, it is essential that the oven is adequately hot and has hit the right temperature. else the pizza may taste undercooked.lt;/pgt;

address.locality: 103, Raghavendra Colony, Gachibowli, Kondapur, Telangana 500084, India

descriptor.name: Pizza
descriptor.short_desc: Savor the authentic flavors of Italy with our handcrafted Italian pizza, made with love and traditio
descriptor.long_desc: Delicious hand-tossed Italian pizza with a thin, crispy crust, topped with fresh ingredients, authentic tomato sauce, and melted mozzarella cheese for a truly classic taste of Italy.

descriptor.name: Indian
descriptor.short_desc: The Indian samosa is one of the most beloved and iconic snacks in Indian cuisine.
descriptor.long_desc: The Indian samosa is one of the most beloved and iconic snacks in Indian cuisine. It's a deep-fried or baked pastry filled with a savory stuffing, often enjoyed as a tea-time snack, street food, or appetizer.

descriptor.name: Cake
descriptor.short_desc: A moist and fluffy cake, baked to perfection, layered with creamy frosting and crafted with the fine
descriptor.long_desc: Indulge in the rich and delightful flavors of our freshly baked cake, a perfect blend of softness and sweetness. Made with premium ingredients, this cake offers a moist, fluffy texture that melts in your mouth.

descriptor.name: italian pizza
descriptor.short_desc: an italian pizza refers to the one that’s cooked in a very hot oven and features a thin crust and simple flavors. it is the most common type of pizza
descriptor.long_desc: lt;pgt;anamp;nbsp;lt;stronggt;italian pizzalt;/stronggt;amp;nbsp;refers to the one thatamp;rsquo;s cooked in a very hot oven and features a thin crust and simple flavors. it is the most common type of pizza served in most places.lt;/pgt;lt;pgt;although the primary flavors of an italian pizza come from its signature pizza sauce and thin crust, toppings like onion, capsicum, chicken, etc., can also be added.lt;/pgt;lt;pgt;to ensure you get the perfect italian pizza, it is essential that the oven is adequately hot and has hit the right temperature. else the pizza may taste undercooked.lt;/pgt;

descriptor.name: indian samosa
descriptor.short_desc: a samosa is a pastry that is filled with savory ingredients and can be fried or baked
descriptor.long_desc: lt;pgt;a samosa isamp;nbsp;a pastry that is filled with savory ingredients and can be fried or baked.amp;nbsp;samosas are a popular snack or appetizer in many regions of the world, including south asia, southeast asia, and parts of africalt;/pgt;

descriptor.name: mexican patty sandwich
descriptor.short_desc: a refreshing filling of red and black kidney beans patty, topped with aromatic mexican seasoning to spice up your palate
descriptor.long_desc: lt;pgt;a refreshing filling of red and black kidney beans patty, topped with aromatic mexican seasoning to spice up your palate. tast ofamp;nbsp;mexican.lt;/pgt;
